Package edu.thu.keg.mdap.datamodel

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DataContent
    Data Object, who gives access to actual data from data providers.
    DataField
    This interface stands for a field in a dataset.
    DataSet
    Contains all metadata describing a dataset, stored in a data provider.
    Query
    Used for getting data from a data source.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AggregatedDataField  
    GeneralDataField
    A general implementation of the interface DataField.
    Query.OrderClause
    Representing a Order clause in the Query for ordering data
    Query.WhereClause
    Representing a Where clause in the Query for filtering data
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    AggregatedDataField.AggrFunction  
    DataField.FieldFunctionality  
    DataField.FieldType  
    Query.Operator
    Operator available for where clause
    Query.Order
    Orders available for the OrderBy clause
